channel.title: Ed's Auto Detailing
channel.description: Recent content on Ed's Auto Detailing

item.title: The Full Detail
item.description: A comprehensive inside, and out detail. An exterior refresh paired with an interior deep clean. Perfect to bring your car back to like new.

item.title: Interior Deep Clean
item.description: A thorough interior cleaning that can bring back that new car feel. Includes every surface from the headliner down.

item.title: Exterior Refresh
item.description: The classic “buff and wax”. Paint is machine polished using an all in one that corrects minor swirls and light scratches while adding a layer of wax.

item.title: Headlight Restoration
item.description: Restore foggy headlights to a like new finish. Headlights are wetsanded to restore the plastic lenses until they’re almost perfect. Helps improve visibility at night.

item.title: Interior Spill Cleanup
item.description: Spills happen. Whether it’s soda, coffee, paint, bodily fluids, or something else we can help. Removal of interior parts such as seats and trim pieces can be done as needed.

item.title: Vinyl / Decal Removal
item.description: Removal of vinyl, decals, or clear bra from the exterior of a vehicle. Perfect for old, or no longer needed vinyl on a vehicle’s paint, or glass.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Have a question, or want to set up an appointment? Give us a shout we’re easy to reach. phone 207-213-7547 email contact@edsautodetailing.com

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: How do you price details? We quote based off vehicle size, and condition. Since it can be difficult to assess the condition of the vehicle over the phone we’ll give you a price range of what the cost could be. Upon seeing the vehicle we can give an absolute amount and promise not to raise the price after completing the job. All quotes are valid for 30 days. Do you accept credit cards?

item.title: Hours
item.description: Please note that since we are by appointment, our hours may vary slightly. Monday 8am - 4:30pm Tuesday 8am - 4:30pm Wednesday 8am - 4:30pm Thursday 8am - 4:30pm Friday 8am - 4:00pm Saturday Closed Sunday Closed

item.title: Location
item.description: Conveniently located next to the Gardiner Car And Truck Wash off Brunswick Ave we’re hard to miss.
